mapper.select: select sal.salary_no, em.emp_no, em.emp_name, em.dept_name, em.emp_phone, em.emp_hiredate, sal.sal_date, sal.sal, sal.sal_bonus from (select * from emp e, dept d where e.dept_no = d.dept_no) em, salary sal where em.emp_no = sal.emp_no

select sal.salary_no, em.emp_no, em.emp_name, em.dept_name, em.emp_phone, em.emp_hiredate, sal.sal_date, sal.sal, sal.sal_bonus, j.job_name from (select * from emp e, dept d where e.dept_no = d.dept_no) em, salary sal, job j where em.emp_no = sal.emp_no and em.job_no = j.job_no and sal.emp_no = #{emp_no}

select * from (select rownum rnum, ex.* from (select sal.salary_no, em.emp_no, em.emp_name, em.dept_name, em.emp_phone, em.emp_hiredate, sal.sal_date, sal.sal, sal.sal_bonus from (select * from emp e, dept d where e.dept_no = d.dept_no) em, salary sal where (em.emp_no = sal.emp_no and emp_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%') or (em.emp_no = sal.emp_no and dept_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%')) ex) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

select sal.salary_no, em.emp_no, em.emp_name, em.dept_name, em.emp_phone, em.emp_hiredate, sal.sal_date, sal.sal, sal.sal_bonus from (select * from emp e, dept d where e.dept_no = d.dept_no) em, salary sal where (em.emp_no = sal.emp_no and emp_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%') or (em.emp_no = sal.emp_no and em.dept_name like '%'||#{emp_name}||'%')
